RemiliaMod:Scratch.NAME: Vampire Claw
RemiliaMod:Scratch.DESCRIPTION: Basic physical attack that deals !D! points damage

RemiliaMod:Defend.NAME: Go away!
RemiliaMod:Defend.DESCRIPTION: Remilia holds her head and cowers, gaining !B! Block.

RemiliaMod:CAattack.NAME: Combo : First Strike
RemiliaMod:CAattack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, draw 1 card and upgrade this card for the rest of the combat. Get Combo : Second Strike after playing 3 times.
RemiliaMod:CAattack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, draw 1 card and upgrade this card for the rest of the combat. Get Combo : Second Strike after playing 3 times.

RemiliaMod:CAattack_t.NAME: Combo : Second Strike
RemiliaMod:CAattack_t.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! physical damage twice. Get Combo : Final Strike after playing 3 times. Upgrade this card for the rest of combat.
RemiliaMod:CAattack_t.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! physical damage twice. Get Combo : Final Strike after playing 3 times. Upgrade this card for the rest of combat.

RemiliaMod:CAattack_s.NAME: Combo : Final Strike
RemiliaMod:CAattack_s.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Physical damage to all enemies. Upgrade this card for the rest of combat. Exhaust .
RemiliaMod:CAattack_s.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Physical damage to all enemies. Upgrade this card for the rest of combat. Exhaust .

RemiliaMod:CFx.NAME: Flight Mode
RemiliaMod:CFx.DESCRIPTION: Gain Flight for the rest of combat

RemiliaMod:CFxAttack.NAME: Flying blow
RemiliaMod:CFxAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! physical damage. Upgrade this card for the rest of combat. Requires Flight.

RemiliaMod:CFTAttack.NAME: Flying kick
RemiliaMod:CFTAttack.DESCRIPTION: Remilia cause !D! physical damage 2 times. Apply 1 vulnerable. Upgrade all. Requires Flight.

RemiliaMod:CDB.NAME: Piercing Blow
RemiliaMod:CDB.DESCRIPTION: Remilia causes !D! Physical damage 4 times and gives the enemy !M! Vulnerable.

RemiliaMod:CD6B.NAME: Crippling Blow
RemiliaMod:CD6B.DESCRIPTION: Remilia deals !D! Physical damage 4 times and gives the enemy !M! Weak.

RemiliaMod:CJDB.NAME: Aerial Strike
RemiliaMod:CJDB.DESCRIPTION: Remilia deals !D! Physical damage 4 times, gives the enemy !M! Vulnerable and draws one card. Requires Flight.

RemiliaMod:CSlAttack.NAME: Burst Fire
RemiliaMod:CSlAttack.DESCRIPTION: Remilia deals !D! Physical damage 3 times. If it destroys the target's block, then Upgrade all.

RemiliaMod:CMABianfuzhen.NAME: Bat Swarm
RemiliaMod:CMABianfuzhen.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! magical damage to all enemies. Upgrade all and draw one card. If you have 3 copies in hand, obtain Lesser Gungnir.
RemiliaMod:CMABianfuzhen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Magic A Remelia's Magical Damage Attack Magic A

RemiliaMod:CMADc.NAME: Vampire Bat
RemiliaMod:CMADc.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! magical damage 10 times. If you have 1 rune, Upgrade All. If you have 3 copies in your hand, obtain Eternal Night.
RemiliaMod:CMADc.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Need a layer of rune preparation.

RemiliaMod:CMAXSq.NAME: Lesser Gungnir
RemiliaMod:CMAXSq.DESCRIPTION: Deals !D!  Magic damage, upgrade all. Apply Weak and Vulnerable. Requires 2 Runes.
RemiliaMod:CMAXSq.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Need two layers of rune preparation

RemiliaMod:CMODSq.NAME: Flawless Gungnir
RemiliaMod:CMODSq.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D!  magic damage to all, upgrade all. Apply Weak and Vulnerable. Require Red Mist Incident and 4 Runes.
RemiliaMod:CMODSq.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Need four layers of rune preparation and red fog change

RemiliaMod:CPHwYb.NAME: Red Mist Incident
RemiliaMod:CPHwYb.DESCRIPTION: The Red Mist is spreading over the battlefield... Exhaust . Ethereal.

RemiliaMod:CHMF.NAME: Red magic
RemiliaMod:CHMF.DESCRIPTION: Remilia deals !D! Magical damage to all. Apply !M! Poison. Require Red Mist Incident.

RemiliaMod:CPXsg.NAME: Millenium Vampire
RemiliaMod:CPXsg.DESCRIPTION: Remilia gains Millenium Vampire for the remaining of the fight.

RemiliaMod:CFPLL.NAME: Offense Switch
RemiliaMod:CFPLL.DESCRIPTION: Remilia gains 1 Strength in exchange for one dexterity.

RemiliaMod:CFPMJ.NAME: Defense Switch
RemiliaMod:CFPMJ.DESCRIPTION: Remilia gains 1 Dexterity in exchange for 1 strength.

RemiliaMod:CJNJQFY.NAME: Smart defense
RemiliaMod:CJNJQFY.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. Discard 1 card. Gain !B! Block.

RemiliaMod:CJNFWZL.NAME: Runic expertise
RemiliaMod:CJNFWZL.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 rune. Draw 1 card. Gain !B! Block.

RemiliaMod:CMEJNS.NAME: Mal'Ganis
RemiliaMod:CMEJNS.DESCRIPTION: You essentially cannot die. Gain 820 Block and 3280 Intangible. All enemies lose 999 Strength.

RemiliaMod:CJNHS.NAME: Trash can
RemiliaMod:CJNHS.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. NL Gain [B] equivalent to its cost.

RemiliaMod:CMAXBY.NAME: Lesser Night
RemiliaMod:CMAXBY.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Magic damage 3 times to all enemies. Upgrade All. Inflict Weak and Vulnerable to all. Requires 3 Runes.

RemiliaMod:CJNSP.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. Draw a card. Gain !B! Block

RemiliaMod:CJNCMSS.NAME: Silent killer

RemiliaMod:CWYW.NAME: Lich King

RemiliaMod:CJNMJFZ.NAME: Dexterity reversal
RemiliaMod:CJNMJFZ.DESCRIPTION: Remilia uses a little trick to exchange her dexterity and her enemy's, gaining 6 times the difference in block.

RemiliaMod:CPBZMF.NAME: Blood Frenzy
RemiliaMod:CPBZMF.DESCRIPTION: Fear not power itself, but the one who wields it.

RemiliaMod:CPFPDLL.NAME: Reckless Mistress

RemiliaMod:CPQHZZ.NAME: Venomous Minions
